title: Current Year Date Support
custom_preconds: Given the current year's Opening Day release is out on the scoreboard, calendar, schedule... and any other date UI
custom_steps: When the user attempts to navigate the dates within the same calendar year (i.e 2018), check the following pages: Club Schedules, Leagues Scoreboard, and Standings
custom_expected:
The user will only be able to navigate the dates from April to September of the same calendar year (i.e. 2018)

NOTE: Standings is a webview, so it should switch automatically to the current year (2018) once the season is considered "started" in the database

title: Class Dates for 2018

custom_expected: Then the user will view the following start / end dates for the current year

title: MiLB.TV EPG Date Range Change
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps: When a user taps on the MiLB.TV EPG

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be able to access the current year's (i.e. 2018) live feeds & archives
as well as previous year's (i.e. 2017) archives
